name: Omen Records
description: We believe that music should be authentic yet beautiful.
paragraph: Discover the pulse of global drum and bass with our distinctive label. Blending electronic mastery with cultural vibrancy, our worldwide artists create a transcendent sonic journey. Join us in showcasing the finest beats from around the globe.
contactInformationText: We're open to talk to good people. Just say hello and we'll start a productive cooperation.
